original: CEDERHOLM, Sven Henrik, Förvaltare, Skultuna, f Örebro 21/12 84 av grhdl F J C o Anna Bohberg, gm Hilda Nordström. Studex Örebro 03, agronomex Ultuna 06. 2:e lär v Tomta lantbr.sk i Västmanl l 06—08, l:e lär v Rånäs d:o i Sthlms l 08—12, insp å Lovisedal pr Rö o Norr-Jersjö pr Söderbykarl 12—18, å Brandalsund pr Södertälje 18—24, förvalt v Skultuna Bruk sed. 24. Ordf i Skultuna krist.-nmd, v. ordf i Skultuna hushålln.krets, ersätt f ordf i Västerås stifts VIII boställsdistr, skiftesgodeman, led av kyrkoflm, fattigv.styr, tax.nmd, lönenmd, markegångsnmd o hästut-tagn.nmd, v. ordf i Västml l hästavels.frn, v. ordf i centralstyr f Sv Lantbrukstjm.frn, sekr o kassör i Norrbo hingstfrn. Resor: Tyskl 09. Av trycket: "Upps i lantbr.frågor. Odd Fellow. Skyttemärke g. Hobbies: Naturvetenskap, foto.
translated: CEDERHOLM, Sven Henrik, Administrator, Skultuna, b. Örebro 21/12 1884, son of farmer F J C and Anna Bohberg, m. Hilda Nordström. Graduated from Örebro 1903, agronomist from Ultuna 1906. Second instructor at Tomta Agricultural School in Västmanland 1906-1908, first instructor at Rånäs Agricultural School in Stockholm county 1908-1912, inspector at Lovisedal Estate in Södermanland and Norr-Jersjö Estate in Söderbykarl 1912-1918, at Brandalsund Estate in Södertälje 1918-1924, administrator at Skultuna Works since 1924. Chairman of Skultuna Christian Committee, deputy chairman of Skultuna Housekeeping Circle, substitute chairman of Västerås Diocese VIII Parsonage District, land division trustee, member of cemetery board, poor relief board, tax committee, salary committee, and horse selection committee, deputy chairman of Västmanland Horse Breeding Association, deputy chairman of central board of Swedish Agricultural Girls' Union, secretary and treasurer of Norrbo Stallion Association. Travels: Germany 1909. Published work: "Uplift in Agricultural Matters". Member of Odd Fellow. Sports: Nature science, photography.

structured.name: Sven Henrik Cederholm
structured.description: Published work: 'Uplift in Agricultural Matters'. Member of Odd Fellow. Sports: Nature science, photography.
